short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper to work with Track+ and Trello

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you adding links for your work with Trackplus (Track+) and Trello and become more agile.

Create buttons on your cards so that you have quick access to your tasks and do not waste time doing Ctrl+ C and Ctrl + V from side to side.

If you want to change how the add-on search all Track+'s numbers, you can go to Settings -> Extensions dialog and click on Configuration button and choose one option.
